column3: Storylet Text
You wake up sweating inside your room; you look around and feel scared

You crawl out your bed to go to your parents room. You run to your parents room; the feeling of someone following you becoming greater as you rush towards your parents room. new-l new-lYou only feeling; calm once you reach your parents room.

You crawl up between your parents; feeling the safety of being with your parents and the warmth of their bodies makes you eventually fall asleep. new-lnew-lYou are awoken to loud boom sound. You see your Dad rushing outside with your flashlight in hand. You step outside your parent's room.

You cover yourself with your blanket; and take deep breaths to calm yourself. Eventually you drift off to sleep. new-l new-lYou are awoken again by the sound of distant commotion and a loud boom sound. new-lnew-lCurious to see; you crawl out of your bed. You try to turn the light on; but there's a power outage.You grab your flashlight.

You decide to go to your parents room. As you move through the hallway you. You hear commotion outside. Your heart starts beating a bit faster and you start running towards your parents room. new-lnew-lAs you are about to reach the door; your dad comes out and looks at you with a look of panic. He rushes past you to go outside the house.

With your heart in your mouth; you think of going outside. You slowly move outside; and see that the sky is in a hue of orange It almost feels like hell has come to earth. new-l new-lYou see your next door neighbor putting things in the car.

Sensing something is amiss; you rush outside behind your Dad.As you step outside you see that the sky is a hue of orange. It feels like hell itself as come to earth. You see your dad talking to your friend Aleem's Father. You see Aleem; your best friend rushing behind his mother as they are putting their things in the car.

You rush to Dad's side; as he is talking to Aleem's Dad. You overhear him saying DQPack your things; and leave quickly. They are coming Charles! The government is attacking the district to quell the rebellionDQ as he puts a heavy suitcase inside the car. new-lnew-lYou notice a barrel hitting the ground not too far from you. Suddenly there's a loud blast which knocks you off your feet as you hit the ground and black-out.
DQAleem!; Aleem!DQ; you call out to your friend as you rush towards him. You see him carrying a large suitcase.As he turns; you notice tears rolling down his eyes as he faces you.

He looks at you; with a look of hopelessness. DQThey are coming  INSERT_NAME; We all have to run as far away from here as possible. The Andorian government have started their attack. They are bombing the entire district to quell the rebellionDQ. new-lYou see Aleem's Mom pulling Aleem inside the car. He reluctantly lets go of you. new-lnew-lYou notice a barrel hitting the ground on the other side of the car about 50 feet away from you. Suddenly there's a loud blast which knocks you off your feet as you hit the ground and black-out.

column2: Ask him Why is he crying?
column3: DQThey have already killed Uncle Adrian; they are coming INSERT_NAME; It's happening whatever they said in the news. It's happening. DQ
You take the weight off his shoulder; as you put it in the car. He puts a hand on your shoulder as he breaks down infront of you.

You hear a high-pitched ringing in your ears; as you open your eyes ever so slightly. You see that there's nothing left of the house beside Aleem's House; and most of Aleem's house destroyed. You turn around to see that Aleem;s Dad who was on the other side of the car is bleeding as he lay on the ground; You see Aleem's mother kneeling beside him; As she cradles his head She calls out DQAleem! Aleem!DQ; looking past you. You frantically look around and see your Dad on the ground lying beside Aleem.

You get up and start limping towards Dad; you notice that you have a deep cut in your leg. You feel the pain overcoming your sense as you take a step; you cry out. Pulling yourself you crawl to Dad; You see his arm is bleeding you quickly grab a cloth from a bag lying beside you which you saw Aleem carrying. new-lYou tightly wrap the cloth around his arm. As you were taught at the school in your First Aid Class. you take another piece of cloth and tie on the wound on your leg.

You get up and start limping towards Aleem; you notice that you have a deep cut in your leg. You feel the pain overcoming your sense as you take a step; you cry out. Pulling yourself you crawl to Aleem; You see his arm is bleeding you quickly grab a cloth from a bag lying beside you which you saw Aleem carrying. new-lYou tightly wrap the cloth around his arm. As you were taught at the school in your First Aid Class. you take another piece of cloth and tie on the wound on your leg.

You grab another piece of cloth from the bag and start crawling towards Dad; As you reach him; Your mom comes rushing out of the house. Carrying your little sister. She's too young to comprehend what is happening around her. new-lnew-lYour mom reaches your dad before you; and you see her give out a loud shreik. You start moving quicker as you realize what might have happend. As you reach him you see a pool of blood collected around your Dad's head. You can't believe what has happened in just a few short moments. You try to feel his pulse but to no avail. You start crying out loudly as you break down and hold his head in your hands. You notice army jeeps pulling up in your streets as they start clearing out the remainder of the people that are left.

You grab another piece of cloth from the bag and start crawling towards Aleem; As you reach him; Your mom comes rushing out of the house. Carrying your little sister. She's too young to comprehend what is happening around her. Your mom reaches your dad and cradles his head in her lap. You start moving quicker towards Aleem. As you reach him you see a pool of blood collected around his head. You can't believe what has happened in just a few short moments. You try to feel his pulse but to no avail. You start crying out loudly as you break down and hold his head in your hands. new-lnew-l You notice army jeeps sirens going off as they start pulling up in in the streets to clear out the remainder of the resistance that are left.

Seeing the army vans coming you start limping towards your house. You huddle up with your mom; she supporting #OBJ as they hastily make their way inside the house. Meanwhile you carry _DEAD_ inside. Refusing to leave him outside. As you turn; you realize that Aleem's mother is still outside mourning the loss of both her son and her husband. You are gutted by this feeling of loss of your best friend and feel the floor shift below your feet. As you see a caravan of Army pull up. You call out to Aleem's mother to warn her as she mourns beside her loved one's; but she doesn't hears you.

As the army rounds up around Aleem's mother you watch the horific scene unfold as they surround her with their guns pointing at her. Your mother pulls you away from the scene as you hear the sounds of gunshots being fired.

You decide to run outside to warn her about the Army; your mother tries to stop you as you break free from her grasp. You limp and reach Aleem's mother side. Your mother comes running behind you as the Andorian soldiers surrounds you with their guns pointing towards you. new-lnew-lThere are three soldiers surrounding you; as they move in closer. Each with a gun pointed towards one of your heads.

You plead to the soldiers; DQPlease let us go; we haven't done anything. We are not the part of the rebellion. We have already lost a lot today.DQ; as soon as you complete the sentence one of them shoots at Aleem's Mother. You stand their shocked; as the bullet hits her in her arm; She let's go a cry of agony. There's only so much you can take as you collapse on the ground. Your hands to your mouth as you hold back your vomit.

You raise your hands in the air and go down on your knees; as you watch the soldiers closing in around you.You feel guilty for running outside as you feel you've put even your mother in danger as you watch her kneel down beside you. You watch one of them going to check the opened luggage sprawled across the street; to see he can find something to make worth his while; as the other two have their guns cocked towards your group. new-lnew-lIt's been close to 10 minutes now when suddenly you hear a gunshot as one of the soldier hits the ground.

With the soldiers distracted; you take your chance. You grab your mother and Aleem's Mother's arms as you start running in the direction of your house. Suddenly you hear a gunshot as you feel Aleem's mother drop in her tracks. You look behind in horror to find her eyes wide in shock as she drops on the ground. You feel anger in your gut like never before; this is so unjust. She deserved better than this; You turn to see soldiers as both of them are hit by a bullet. new-lnew-lYou see your uncle pull up with his group of rebels as they rush to your aid. You finally feel the adrenaline leaving your body as the whole ordeal comes to a close but at what cost. As you kneel down beside Aleem's Mother.

You don't do anything as one of the soldiers come rushing towards you to take cover behind you. Your mother sense this and throws herself infront you. The soldier seeing this take her up as a human body shield. You watch in horror as the second soldier drops as well. Leaving just one of them who has taken your mother hostage. Looking towards the direction where the second gunshot had come from he calls out DQCome out or else she dies!DQ. You see your uncle step out from the shadows with his hands in the air. new-lnew-lStrangely you feel a bit of relief seeing your uncle one of the leading figures in the rebellion. Surely he wouldn't have come alone. You look on the other side; to see someone in the shadows taking the aim at the soldier's head. Waiting for the perfect opportunity to strike. You are in that position for 30 seconds but that feels like an eternity when you hear a gunshot and you see the soldier go limp as he drops down along with your mother. You rush to your mother's side as you feel finally something has gone right in that day. You hug your mother as tears roll down her cheeks.
